About me

Iâ€™m a co-tutelle PhD student at Vislab/Ambarella, located in Parma (Italy) and Inria - RITS team, in Paris (France). I am mainly interested in Generative Adversarial Networks and Domain Adaptation, and the purpose of my research is to build perception systems for autonomous driving resistant to adverse weather.

News

  • 15/03/2020: Back in Parma and quarantined.

  • 12/10/2019: Paper accepted at WACV20.
  • 23/10/2019: New arxiv preprint for the Domain Bridge paper. Link
